title: RITO SUGGESTION
body:
So I was thinking, a chat box while  we wait for the game to start would be a great idea.
Could pre game strategise, or just talk jibberish to each other. Just cos, i think it would be a good idea to keep keep in contact and yeah stop the boredom when we wait a while for the game to start.

Let us know what you guys think :3

replies.body:
Well then! My bad. I didn't know this had been brought up haha. Glad to know heaps of people feel the same way though.
